title: Any item cannot be selected at the first attempt in library outline view
description: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected initially.
OB: When attempting to select an item for the first time in the library outline view, the item does not get selected.
EB: Upon reattempting to select the same item for the second time, it can be selected successfully.
SR:
1. Open the library outline view
2. Attempt to select an item for the first time
3. Observe that the item does not get selected
4. Reattempt to select the same item for the second time
5. Observe that the item gets selected successfully
